entry.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - 46J03
entry.content:
Dec 4, 08:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/12/2022 06:15 UTC
End Time : 04/12/2022 08:15 UTC
Service impact : IPMI service was temporarily unavailable on rack 46J03
Root cause : A network equipment failure caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
